name: Skyscrappersim (BENO edition)
description:
[NOTE: SKYSCRAPPERSIM HAVE BEEN DISCONTINUED AND THIS IS NOT MINE!, I'M ONLY ADDING IT TO ITCH FOR THOSE WHO NEED, AND SKYSCRAPPER SIM IS NOT MADE BY BENO, BENO ONLY RECREATES IT BECAUSE IT WAS DISCONTINUED AND NO LONGER AVAILABLE, AND ITS ALREADY RELEASED BUT THEY STOP WORKING ON IT]

Building Creator: http://beno.org.uk/skyscrapersim/creator/

Random Building Creator: http://beno.uk/skyscrapersim/random/

Note: For Apple Computers or phones, there is no version for them except windows, sorry if you cant download

All the screenshot is from the Island map

ALL FILES ARE ORIGINAL FROM BENO'S WEBSITE!

Note to BENO if he sees this actually: Pls dont copyright me, I'm only making it on itch

Use WASD to move, mouse control for clicking

(People who likes elevator should play this :D)

if skyscrapersim doesn't run, then you need to download the Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Runtime Libraries

Beno's website: beno.uk

Beno Skyscrappersim Website: http://beno.uk/skyscrapersim/

Skyscrapersim is Copyright (C)2003-2010 Ryan Thoryk, and is under the GNU General Public License

Beno Building Creators are Copyright to Beno (all rights reserved).

The buildings (the stuff in the data/beno folder) is Copyright to Beno(all rights reserved).

Note from beno himself: "Please note: This is an old project, I have not worked on Skyscrapersim for a long time now. Also the original Skyscrapersim project is no longer being developed.
I will no longer be able to help you if you encounter any problems with Skyscrapersim, sorry. (this is a past project wich is no longer being worked on)."
